TopicTitle: Will KSP 2 Get its Own Forum? Or will it be part of the current KSP website?

Articles.Content: It might, or it might not. Depends on what the devs or forum people or whoever makes these types of decisions decide on.
It sound like a good idea.
Already has been asked. The likely scenario is that it’ll remain in the ksp2 subforum.
Already been asked and already been confirmed this is the official forum.
